revised_title: The Action of Zincethyl on Ethylic Leucate and Its Implications for the Production of Lactic Acids
tldr: The authors investigate the reaction between zincethyl and ethylic leucate, providing insights into the formation of lactic acids. They demonstrate the formation of zincmonethyl-ethylic leucate and its role in the production of lactic acids, as well as the two-stage oxidation process involved in the reaction.
